import React from 'react' import Assign from '../images/Assignme.svg' import List from '../images/List.svg' import Myday from '../images/Myday.svg' import Star from '../images/Star.svg' import Task from '../images/Task.svg' import Planned from '../images/Planned.svg' export default function Sidebar({clicked}) { const [list,setList]=React.useState([]) function handleClick(e){ clicked(e.target.innerText); } return (
< div className="sidebar">

My day

Important

Planned

Assigned to me

Task

Shopping

Grocery
) }
